Pistols.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic.

Dual_Wield.display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Dual_Wield.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Bullet_Rain.display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Bullet_Rain.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

Executioners_Shot.display_help: Executioner's Shot is a deadly close range attack. Foes struck by this attack will suffer lethal damage and will likely be knocked back by the impact of this attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Executioners_Shot.display_target_help: The secondary effect placed on you by a Dual Pistols attack varies depending on the type of ammo used. If you were struck with Cryo Rounds, you will suffer from a minor slow effect. If you were struck with Incendiary Rounds you will suffer some damage over time. If you were struck with Chemical Rounds you will have your damage output slightly decreased.

High_Pain_Tolerance.display_help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Fast_Healing.display_help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Quick_Recovery.display_help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Rise_to_the_Challenge.display_help: The more the odds are against you, the more determined you become. When surrounded by foes, your ability to regenerate health increases greatly. Additionally, your resolve and the look in your eye is enough to leave most foes shaken, so their attacks are less accurate. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest regeneration bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Recharge: Slow

Resurgence.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Revive yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Additionally, for 90 seconds, your damage and chance to hit will be improved, then for another 45 seconds, your damage and chance to hit will be diminished. Recharge: Very Long
Resurgence.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and attack rate are improved. Your damage and Endurance recovery are increased as well. You are also protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. The experience is taxing however, and you will soon weaken when all of the effects wear off.

Incendiary_Ammunition.display_help: You've swapped your ammunition and are now equipped with 'Incendiary Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to fire damage and inflict a minor damage over time effect.

Snap_Shots.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Snap_Shots.display_target_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have slowed your regeneration rate.

Aimed_Shot.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Aimed_Shot.display_target_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have slowed your regeneration rate.

Overcharged_Shots.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Overcharged_Shots.display_target_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have slowed your regeneration rate.

Fusillade.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Fusillade.display_target_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have slowed your regeneration rate.

Leadership_Low.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.
Leadership_Low.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.

Leadership_Mid.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.
Leadership_Mid.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.

Leadership_High.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.
Leadership_High.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.

Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.
Leadership_Low.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.

You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.

Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.

Subdue.display_help: Vanessa has slowed your recharge rate and tried to immobilize you!
Subdue.display_target_help: Vanessa has slowed your recharge rate and tried to immobilize you!

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.
Telekinetic_Blast.display_target_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: Vanessa's Psychic Scream has slowed your attack speed.

Dominate.display_help: Vanessa has dominated you. You are Held, and cannot take any action!

Healing_Aura.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Subdue.display_help: Vanessa has slowed your recharge rate and tried to immobilize you!
Subdue.display_target_help: Vanessa has slowed your recharge rate and tried to immobilize you!

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.
Telekinetic_Blast.display_target_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: Vanessa's Psychic Scream has slowed your attack speed.

Dominate.display_help: Vanessa has dominated you. You are Held, and cannot take any action!

Healing_Aura.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Unreliable_Stealth.display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Unreliable_Stealth.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Targeting_Drone.display_help: When this small device is activated, the small Targeting Drone hovers around your head and emits targeting laser sights. The lasers can dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your Perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that DeBuff your chance to hit. While in use, any sniper rifle shots you make will do additional damage. This is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, while active, the Targeting Drone drains Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Targeting_Drone.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your chance to hit.

Hardened.display_help: Some Mindwashed Resistance have been hardened against all forms of control effects.

Phase_Resistance.display_help: Some Mindwashed Resistance have been hardened against phasing.

Survivor.display_help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Gleaming_Blast.display_help: Your Defenses have been reduced by the Gleaming Blast.

Radiant_Strike.display_help: The Radiant Strike has reduced your Defense and knocked you to the ground.

Shining_Shield.display_help: When you toggle on your Shining Shield, you create an energy barrier that grants you high resistance to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Shining_Shield.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Glowing_Touch.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally at moderate range. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Luminous_Detonation.display_help: The Luminous Detonation has reduced your Defense.

Snap_Shot.display_help: The cannon fires a single, armor piercing explosive round sheathed in an energy field to punch through shields.
Snap_Shot.display_target_help: Your resistance to damage has been reduced from the auto-cannon.

AP_Round.display_help: The cannon fires a high density SABOT round at hypersonic speeds. The round can punch through multiple targets in a very small cone.
AP_Round.display_short_help: Ranged Narrow Cone, High DMG(Lethal), Foe -Res, Knockdown
AP_Round.display_target_help: Your resistance to damage has been reduced from the auto-cannon.

HE_Shot.display_help: The cannon fires a single high explosive round that is modified with a power cell. The resulting explosion is a blue plasma cloud, setting targets on fire.
HE_Shot.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal/Smashing), Minor DoT(Fire)
HE_Shot.display_target_help: You are continuing to burn from the plasma fire.

Power_Punch.display_help: The heavy hand's exoskeleton provides them with a strong melee attack when the enemy comes to close quarters.

Heavy_Burst.display_help: This customized rifle fires highly accurate large caliber solid ammunition sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Heavy_Burst.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced from the power rifle.

Power_Punch.display_help: The recruit's exo-skeleton provides them with a strong melee attack in case the enemy comes to close quarters.
Power_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Chance for Foe Disorient

Power_Punch2.display_help: The recruit's exo-skeleton provides them with a strong melee attack in case the enemy comes to close quarters.
Power_Punch2.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Chance for Foe Disorient

Single_Shot.display_help: This customized rifle fires highly accurate large caliber solid ammunition sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Single_Shot.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced from the power rifle.

Heavy_Burst.display_help: This customized rifle fires highly accurate large caliber solid ammunition sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Heavy_Burst.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced from the power rifle.

Covering_Fire.display_help: This rifle fires a burst of large caliber solid ammunition which is sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Covering_Fire.display_target_help: Your speed and recharge rate has been reduced from the power rifle.

Mindwash_Contagion.display_help: The Mindwashed Resistance members are projecting a psychic virus, capable of confusing enemies.

Power_Punch.display_help: The recruit's exo-skeleton provides them with a strong melee attack in case the enemy comes to close quarters.
Power_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Chance for Foe Disorient

Power_Punch2.display_help: The recruit's exo-skeleton provides them with a strong melee attack in case the enemy comes to close quarters.
Power_Punch2.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Chance for Foe Disorient

Burst.display_help: This rifle fires a burst of large caliber solid ammunition which is sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Burst.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced from the power rifle.

Heavy_Burst.display_help: This customized rifle fires highly accurate large caliber solid ammunition sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Heavy_Burst.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced from the power rifle.

Power_Punch.display_help: The recruit's exo-skeleton provides them with a strong melee attack in case the enemy comes to close quarters.

Burst.display_help: This rifle fires a burst of large caliber solid ammunition which is sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.
Burst.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced from the power rifle.

Burst.display_help: This rifle fires a burst of large caliber solid ammunition which is sheathed in an energy field to punch through PPD force fields.

Mystic_Shot_Energy.display_help: This magic attuned rifle shoots concentrated bursts of magical energy. The Runesoldier does not have full control over their magical training, however, so these bursts are occasionally negative energy.

Mystic_Shot_Negative.display_help: This magic attuned rifle shoots concentrated bursts of magical energy. The Runesoldier does not have full control over their magical training, however, so these bursts are occasionally negative energy.

Mystic_Barrage_Energy.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's rapid fire barrage attack with the magical training of the Carnival.

Mystic_Barrage_Negative.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's rapid fire barrage attack with the magical training of the Carnival. Unfortunately, your less than perfect mastery of the training results in a negative energy attack.

Mystic_Smash_Energy.display_help: You retain much of your Resistance armor, even as you learn magic from the Carnival. Your armor's energy punch is now powered by mystic energy.

Mystic_Smash_Negative.display_help: You retain much of your Resistance armor, even as you learn magic from the Carnival. Your armor's energy punch is now powered by mystic energy. Unfortunately, your less than perfect mastery of the training results in a negative energy attack.
Mystic_Smash_Negative.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Negative Energy, Smashing), Stun

Mystic_Burst_Energy.display_help: Trained by the Carnival mistresses, you have learned how to mimic their Radiance attack. However, you are far less effective than they are. The damage type of your energy burst is variable and your Confusion is shorter in duration, weaker in strength and has a lower chance of occurring.

Mystic_Burst_Negative.display_help: Trained by the Carnival mistresses, you have learned how to mimic their Radiance attack. However, you are far less effective than they are. The damage type of your energy burst is variable and your Confusion is shorter in duration, weaker in strength and has a lower chance of occurring.

Mystic_Suppression_Energy.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's suppressive burst fire attack with the magical training of the Carnival, allowing for you to effectively suppress the ability of your foes to attack you.
Mystic_Suppression_Energy.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, as well as your attack and movement speed have been reduced.

Mystic_Suppression_Negative.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's suppressive burst fire attack with the magical training of the Carnival, allowing for you to effectively suppress the ability of your foes to attack you. Unfortunately, your less than perfect mastery of the training results in a negative energy attack.
Mystic_Suppression_Negative.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, as well as your attack and movement speed have been reduced.

Mystic_Shot.display_help: This magic attuned rifle shoots concentrated bursts of magical energy. The Runesoldier does not have full control over their magical training, however, so these bursts are occasionally negative energy.

Mystic_Barrage.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's rapid fire barrage attack with the magical training of the Carnival.

Mystic_Smash.display_help: You retain much of your Resistance armor, even as you learn magic from the Carnival. Your armor's energy punch is now powered by mystic energy.

Mystic_Burst.display_help: Trained by the Carnival mistresses, you have learned how to mimic their Radiance attack. However, you are far less effective than they are. The damage type of your energy burst is variable and your Confusion is shorter in duration, weaker in strength and has a lower chance of occurring.

Mystic_Suppression.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's suppressive burst fire attack with the magical training of the Carnival, allowing for you to effectively suppress the ability of your foes to attack you.
Mystic_Suppression.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, as well as your attack and movement speed have been reduced.
